import React from 'react' import { render } from 'react-dom' import Styles from './Styles' import { Form } from 'react-final-form' import { Field } from 'react-final-form-html5-validation' const sleep = ms => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms)) const onSubmit = async values => { await sleep(300) window.alert(JSON.stringify(values, 0, 2)) } const App = () => (
(

)} /> ) render(, document.getElementById('root'))
